DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine impact diet physical exercise program pregnancy rate live birth obese woman undergo IVF cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Hypocaloric Diet Exercise Obese Women Who Are Subjected IVF Cycle
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study show obesity significantly affect vitro fertilization cycle lower reproductive capacity . The study perform Hospital de la Santa Creu Sant Pau Fundació Puigvert Barcelona . Patients recluted obese woman sterility problem require vitro fertilization ( IVF ) body mass index BMI 30-35 . It´s randomise study half patient undergo 6 week program diet exercice . We analyse response ovaric stimulation , result egg retrieval ( ovocyte number quality ) , rate fecundation , embryo implantation clinical gestation .
DOC.criteria: Women want pregnancy . Basal FSH level ≤ 10 IU / l. Infertility justify treatment IVF/ICSI . Being include long protocol GnRH agonist . Presence ovaries uterus able support embryo implantation pregnancy . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 30 kg/m2 ≤ 35 kg/m2 . Absence pregnancy start ovarian stimulation . Having give write consent . Female age ≤ 18 year ≥ 35 year . Severe male factor permit IVFICSI ejaculate sample . Patients low ovarian reserve ( basal FSH level ≥ 10 IU / l lower antral follicle count 6 follicle ovary ) . HIV seropositivity , HBV HCV . Clinically important disease . Having frozen embryos previous cycle assist reproduction . Unexplained vaginal bleeding . Poor response previous IVF cycle standard stimulation protocols Any contraindication become pregnant . Known allergy preparation gonadotropins excipients . High consumption alcohol , drug psychotropic drug . Concurrent participation another study . Patients do previous cycle IVF / ICSI without success
